<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_biblioshelf_issued_items</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_biblioshelf_issued_items">fine_till_nowVALCHANGESjavascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_snc_biblioshelf_issued_items','fine_till_now', 'USD;USD')^EQ<item endquery="false" field="fine_till_now" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value="javascript:global.getCurrencyFilter('x_snc_biblioshelf_issued_items','fine_till_now', 'USD;USD')"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Total Fine for User</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-25 06:37:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2dd1df1428b5ea10f8775095a779689d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Total Fine for User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Biblioshelf" source="x_snc_biblioshelf">8b7f1e942871ea10f8775095a7796897</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Biblioshelf">8b7f1e942871ea10f8775095a7796897</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2dd1df1428b5ea10f8775095a779689d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-25 08:55:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2dd1df1428b5ea10f8775095a779689d"/></record_update>
